shape_1_per_frame2=i= instance;    sa= i/num_inst;     p= 1+(17*sa)%17;     s= 17*sa-p+1;      c=6.28/360; 
shape_1_per_frame3=
shape_1_per_frame4=c1=  (p==1);    c2=  (p==2);    c3=  (p==3);    c4=  (p==4);   c5= (p==5);
shape_1_per_frame5=c6=  (p==6);    c7=  (p==7);    c8=  (p==8);    c9=  (p==9);   c10= (p==10);
shape_1_per_frame6=c11= (p==11);   c12= (p==12);   c13= (p==13);   c14= (p==14);  c15= (p==15);
shape_1_per_frame7=c16= (p==16);   c17= (p==17);  
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=
shape_1_per_frame10=///                            4. Horn -  c9
shape_1_per_frame11=///                            3. Head - c11
shape_1_per_frame12=///                            2. Neck - c10
shape_1_per_frame13=///    5. L Upper arm - c1                      8. R Upper arm - c15
shape_1_per_frame14=///    6. L Lower arm - c2                      9. R Lower arm - c16
shape_1_per_frame15=///    7. L Hand      - c3                     10. R Hand      - c17
shape_1_per_frame16=///                            1. Torso - c8
shape_1_per_frame17=///   11. L Upper leg - c4                     14. R Upper leg - c12
shape_1_per_frame18=///   12. L Lower leg - c5                     15. R Lower leg - c13
shape_1_per_frame19=///   13. L Foot      - c6                     16. R Foot      - c14
shape_1_per_frame20=///                           17. Tail -  c7
shape_1_per_frame21=
shape_1_per_frame22=
shape_1_per_frame23=v=.25*time;                           /// speed     
shape_1_per_frame24=
shape_1_per_frame25=t1= sin(v);   t2= sin(.6*v);   t3= sin(.8*v);    t4= cos(1.3*v);
shape_1_per_frame26=
shape_1_per_frame27=           
shape_1_per_frame28=//  length        angle (degrees)                   width
shape_1_per_frame29=
shape_1_per_frame30=d1 = 40;       w1 =  -60+ 30*t4+ 10*s;         h1 = 25*sin(1+1.14*s);
shape_1_per_frame31=d2 = 24;       w2 =  w1 +30+25*t1;                h2 = 16;
shape_1_per_frame32=d3 = 0;         w3 =  w2+0 + 5*t2;                h3 = 30;
shape_1_per_frame33=d4 = 0;         w4 =  w3  ;                         h4 = 0*s;
shape_1_per_frame34=d5 = 18;       w5 =  w1+140 - 25*t1;           h5 = 10*(1-.5*s);
shape_1_per_frame35=d6 = 15;       w6 =  w5 - 110 - 20*t3;        h6 = 6*(1-.3*s);
shape_1_per_frame36=d7 = 11;       w7 =  w6 - 5*t3;             h7 = 4*(1+.3*s);
shape_1_per_frame37=d8 = d5;       w8 =  w1+140 + 25*t4;           h8 = h5;
shape_1_per_frame38=d9 = d6;       w9 =  w8 - 110 + 20*t1;        h9 = h6;
shape_1_per_frame39=d10 = d7;     w10 =  w9 + 0-5*t2;             h10 = h7;
shape_1_per_frame40=d11 = 20;     w11 = w1 + 60+25*t3;              h11 = 12*(1-.5*s);
shape_1_per_frame41=d12 = 17;     w12 = w11 + 80 - 25*t4;        h12 = 6*(1-.3*s);
shape_1_per_frame42=d13 = 11;     w13 = w12-80-20*t4;            h13 = 5*(1-.3*s);
shape_1_per_frame43=d14 = d11;    w14 = w1 +60- 25*t1;              h14 = h11;
shape_1_per_frame44=d15 = d12;    w15 = w14 + 80 + 25*t2;        h15 = h12;
shape_1_per_frame45=d16 = d13;    w16 = w15-80+15*t3;            h16 = h13;
shape_1_per_frame46=d17 = 0;      w17 =  0;                      h17 = 0;
shape_1_per_frame47=
shape_1_per_frame48=                                                                                ///     JOINTS      ///    
shape_1_per_frame49= x1=  d1*(-.5+s)*sin(w1*c) ;      y1=   -15+d1*(-.5+s)*cos(w1*c);       x1lj= if(i==0, x1, x1lj);    x1rj= if(c8, x1, x1rj);  
shape_1_per_frame50=                                                                     y1lj= if(i==0, y1, y1lj);    y1rj= if(c8, y1, y1rj); 
shape_1_per_frame51= x2=  x1rj + d2*s*sin(w2*c);       y2=  y1rj +  d2*s*cos(w2*c);      x2j= if(c10, x2, x2j);       y2j= if(c10, y2, y2j); 
shape_1_per_frame52= x3=  x2j  + d3*s*sin(w3*c) ;      y3=  y2j  +  d3*s*cos(w3*c) ;     x3j= if(c11, x3, x3j);       y3j= if(c11, y3, y3j);
shape_1_per_frame53= x4=  x3j  + d4*s*sin(w4*c) ;      y4=  y3j  +  d4*s*cos(w4*c) ;
shape_1_per_frame54= x5=  x1rj + d5*s*sin(w5*c) ;      y5=  y1rj +  d5*s*cos(w5*c) ;     x5j= if(c1, x5, x5j);        y5j= if(c1, y5, y5j);
shape_1_per_frame55= x6=  x5j  + d6*s*sin(w6*c) ;      y6=  y5j  +  d6*s*cos(w6*c) ;     x6j= if(c2, x6, x6j);        y6j= if(c2, y6, y6j);
shape_1_per_frame56= x7=  x6j  + d7*s*sin(w7*c) ;      y7=  y6j  +  d7*s*cos(w7*c) ;                                     
shape_1_per_frame57= x8=  x1rj + d8*s*sin(w8*c) ;      y8=  y1rj +  d8*s*cos(w8*c) ;     x8j= if(c15, x8, x8j);       y8j= if(c15, y8, y8j); 
shape_1_per_frame58= x9=  x8j  + d9*s*sin(w9*c);       y9=  y8j  +  d9*s*cos(w9*c);      x9j= if(c16, x9, x9j);       y9j= if(c16, y9, y9j);
shape_1_per_frame59=x10=  x9j  + d10*s*sin(w10*c);    y10=  y9j  +  d10*s*cos(w10*c);       
shape_1_per_frame60=x11=  x1lj + d11*s*sin(w11*c) ;   y11=  y1lj +  d11*s*cos(w11*c) ;   x11j= if(c4, x11, x11j) ;    y11j= if(c4, y11, y11j); 
shape_1_per_frame61=x12=  x11j + d12*s*sin(w12*c) ;   y12=  y11j +  d12*s*cos(w12*c) ;   x12j= if(c5, x12, x12j);     y12j= if(c5, y12, y12j);
shape_1_per_frame62=x13=  x12j + d13*s*sin(w13*c) ;   y13=  y12j +  d13*s*cos(w13*c) ;
shape_1_per_frame63=x14=  x1lj + d14*s*sin(w14*c) ;   y14=  y1lj +  d14*s*cos(w14*c) ;   x14j= if(c12, x14, x14j);    y14j= if(c12, y14, y14j);
shape_1_per_frame64=x15=  x14j + d15*s*sin(w15*c) ;   y15=  y14j +  d15*s*cos(w15*c) ;   x15j= if(c13, x15, x15j);    y15j= if(c13, y15, y15j);
shape_1_per_frame65=x16=  x15j + d16*s*sin(w16*c) ;   y16=  y15j +  d16*s*cos(w16*c) ;  
shape_1_per_frame66=x17=  x1lj + d17*s*sin(w17*c) ;   y17=  y1lj +  d17*s*cos(w17*c) ;   
shape_1_per_frame67=
shape_1_per_frame68=
shape_1_per_frame69=
shape_1_per_frame70=mx=  c1*x5 + c2*x6 + c3*x7 + c4*x11 + c5*x12 + c6*x13 + c7*x17 + c8*x1 + c9*x4 
shape_1_per_frame71=    + c10*x2 + c11*x3 + c12*x14 + c13*x15 + c14*x16 + c15*x8 + c16*x9 + c17*x10 ;
shape_1_per_frame72=my=  c1*y5 + c2*y6 + c3*y7 + c4*y11 + c5*y12 + c6*y13 + c7*y17 + c8*y1 + c9*y4 
shape_1_per_frame73=    + c10*y2 + c11*y3 + c12*y14 + c13*y15 + c14*y16 + c15*y8 + c16*y9 + c17*y10  ;
shape_1_per_frame74= 
shape_1_per_frame75=
shape_1_per_frame76=z= .001;
shape_1_per_frame77=x= .5 + z*mx/q20;     y= .5+ z*my;
shape_1_per_frame78=
shape_1_per_frame79=
shape_1_per_frame80=ra=  c1*h5 + c2*h6 + c3*h7 + c4*h11 + c5*h12 + c6*h13 + c7*h17 + c8*h1 + c9*h4 
shape_1_per_frame81=    + c10*h2 + c11*h3 + c15*h8 + c16*h9 + c17*h10 + c12*h14 + c13*h15 + c14*h16 ;
shape_1_per_frame82=
shape_1_per_frame83=rad *= z*ra*(1-.0*cos(17*6.28*sa));      
shape_1_per_frame84=
shape_1_per_frame85=
shape_1_per_frame86=
shape_1_per_frame87=r2 += .1*sin(.3*v); 
shapecode_2_enabled=1

shape_2_per_frame1=i= instance;       sa= i/num_inst;         t= .1*time;
shape_2_per_frame2=
shape_2_per_frame3=s1=4*sa;    s2= s1%4;     s3= (i%20)/20;    s4= cos(s3);
shape_2_per_frame4=
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=x1= -.5+sa + 1.5*sin(t) ;
shape_2_per_frame7=y1= .03*(s1-1)*sin(4*s1- 100*t*s4) * (s2>0);
shape_2_per_frame8=
shape_2_per_frame9=
shape_2_per_frame10=t2= 6.3*s3 +  t;
shape_2_per_frame11=
shape_2_per_frame12=x2= x1*cos(t2)-y1*sin(t2);
shape_2_per_frame13=y2= y1*cos(t2)+x1*sin(t2);
shape_2_per_frame14=
shape_2_per_frame15=
shape_2_per_frame16=z= .5;
shape_2_per_frame17=x= .5+ z*x2/q20 ;  
shape_2_per_frame18=y= .5+ z*y2;     
shape_2_per_frame19=
shape_2_per_frame20=
shape_2_per_frame21=rad *= z* (1 + 4*sin(4*3.14*sa)*(s2<1));
shape_2_per_frame22=
shape_2_per_frame23=d= sqrt(x2*x2+y2*y2);
shape_2_per_frame24=
shape_2_per_frame25=r2 = .4+.3*sin(20*d+.7*t); 
shape_2_per_frame26=g2 = r2*r2;

shape_3_per_frame1=tex_ang=.1*time;
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=//// flexi's beat counter
per_frame_4=bt1 = bt1*0.95 + sqr(bass*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_5=mt1 = mt1*0.95 + sqr(mid*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_6=tt1 = tt1*0.95 + sqr(treb*5)*30/fps;
per_frame_7=bt2 = bt2 + bt1*0.005;
per_frame_8=mt2 = mt2 + mt1*0.005;
per_frame_9=tt2 = tt2 + tt1*0.005;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q1 = bt2 *0.01;
per_frame_12=q2 = mt2 *0.01;
per_frame_13=q3 = tt2 *0.01;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q4=2+.7*sin(.3*q1);
per_frame_16=q5=.5+.5*sin(.5*q2);
per_frame_17=q6=.2*abs(sin(.1*q3));
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=decay=1;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=q20=aspecty;
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=
per_pixel_1=/// based on bdrv code
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=rot= .1*pow(-ang,3) - q4*sin((.5+.5*sin(.2*q1))*ang);
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=zoom= (.8+.2*sin(.2*q2)) * sin((.2*sin(.2*q3))-rad)+1.3;
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=zoom +=  q6*sin(10*sin(q5+x));
